source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
	[No_],
	[Sell-to Customer No_],
	[Bill-to Customer No_],
	[Posting Date],
	[Shipment Date],
	[Location Code],
	[ECOM],
	[Last Modified On],
	'AP' as Site_Code
FROM [dbo].[BIPL - ANDHRA PRADESH$Sales Cr_Memo Header]
where year([Posting Date]) >= 2020 and year([Posting Date]) < 2022
UNION ALL
SELECT 
	[No_],
	[Sell-to Customer No_],
	[Bill-to Customer No_],
	[Posting Date],
	[Shipment Date],
	[Location Code],
	[ECOM],
